name: HypaHub
headline: A Cloud-Based Bioinformatics and AI Platform
description:
HypaHub is a Cloud-Based Bioinformatics and AI Platform. It is the first HIPAA-compliant Bioinformatics SaaS that runs natively on users' clouds, providing both operation- and price-transparency. 

Our product is a one-stop shop to access complex technologies designed for scientists building data applications or performing data analytics to extract insights. It automates the creation and manages the operation of computing resources, eliminating the need for enterprises to set up and maintain a high-end R&D cloud infrastructure.

founders.name: Hugo Lam, Founder
founders.description: Hugo has over 20 years of experience in software, bioinformatics, and genomics, including time at Roche (SW: ROG), Bina (acquired by Roche), Personalis (NASDAQ: PSNL), 23andMe (NASDAQ: ME), and PCCW (SEHK: 8). Prior to founding HypaHub, Hugo was Senior Director and Head of Bioinformatics at Roche. He is an alumnus of HKUST, Imperial College London, Yale University, Stanford Medical School, and Cambridge Judge Business School. He has published in over 40 publications with over 35,000 citations.

# Build, manage and deliver genomic analytics on time
HypaHub is a one-stop bioinformatics solution to access complex technologies designed for scientists building data applications or performing data analytics to extract insights.

About
## How it Works
All-in-one solution to automate and manage your resources for insights 
Put HypaHub to work. Invest your time where it's needed.
![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/9bebb8_f188e891f6ba4d80a8288ed694ce226e~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_90,h_37,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_3,enc_avif,quality_auto/9bebb8_f188e891f6ba4d80a8288ed694ce226e~mv2.png)

![abs_ml_screen.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/9bebb8_d8fa797f85d947bf8efde3af7b791b36~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_49,h_29,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/abs_ml_screen.png)
![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/c837a6_1045be3adbb14173aebfae46c5c230ee~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_185,h_185,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_3,enc_avif,quality_auto/Artboard%201.png)
Orchestrates Resources
![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/c837a6_c1a0b36ac9cd4978a39ab87c8f78397c~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_168,h_168,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_3,enc_avif,quality_auto/Artboard%201%20copy%202.png)
Reduces Complexity
![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/c837a6_bbc8ce93eca1474eb713311e81aa6c0b~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_168,h_168,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_3,enc_avif,quality_auto/Artboard%201%20copy.png)
Saves Overhead Cost
HypaHub automates the creation and manages the operation of computing resources, eliminating the need for enterprises to set up and maintain a high-end R&D cloud infrastructure.
[Get a Demo](https://www.hypahub.com/<https:/www.hypahub.com>)
![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/c837a6_2119733e838e4a2f8813ebde736f99d5~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_107,h_76,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/c837a6_2119733e838e4a2f8813ebde736f99d5~mv2.jpg)
Unparalleled transparency.
Impeccable reliability.
We provide transparency for both operation and cost.
### Store Big, Think Big
Bring your computation to the data. With zero onboarding, HypaHub helps you store, migrate, and scale with big data securely on the cloud in a HIPAA environment. Encrypted and restricted storages are available.
[Get a Demo](https://www.hypahub.com/<https:/www.hypahub.com>)
![icon_data.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/9bebb8_8b239348adcb43c58d005dfa0c5c5b30~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_116,h_101,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/icon_data.png)
![icon_app.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/9bebb8_de51647180db4d339de564f93a8f80d4~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_118,h_109,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/icon_app.png)
### Maximize your Productivity
HypaHub's "Eco computing" can save up to 10x on your expenses, while our variety of tools, including our professional applications such as HypaBfx, HypaML, and HypaCluster, and their maintenance can save your team 30% of time if not more.
[Get a Demo](https://www.hypahub.com/<https:/www.hypahub.com>)
![bfx_wordcloud.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/ee212a_86229b6307a04aeb87774e801dafe68f~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_111,h_111,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/bfx_wordcloud.png)
### Empower your Analytics
Bootstrap with our friendly AI tools. HypaHub integrates state-of-the-art workflow engines, cutting-edge applications, and your favorite coding and data science tools to suit your need in solving a complex problem. End-to-end analytics are easier than ever.
[Get a Demo](https://www.hypahub.com/<https:/www.hypahub.com>)
![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/11062b_03c50f8fe4a34cc297a984e483a282eff000.jpg/v1/fill/w_147,h_83,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/11062b_03c50f8fe4a34cc297a984e483a282eff000.jpg)
## Our Clients
Why companies like HypaHub?
"Hands down the best tool in our R&D cloud"
HypaHub is hands down the best tool in our R&D cloud. It has helped us accelerate our scientific discovery beyond our imagination.

generated_description:
**HypaHub: Simplifying Bioinformatics with Innovations in AI**

Founded in 2019 and part of the Y Combinator Batch W22, HypaHub is making waves from its base in Sunnyvale, California. This unique startup combines bioinformatics and AI into a cloud-based platform thatâ€™s the first of its kind to be HIPAA-compliant while running natively on users' clouds. 

**Mission & Offering**  
HypaHubâ€™s mission is straightforward yet critical: to provide a one-stop shop for scientists who need to build data applications or perform analytics without the hassle of managing complex cloud infrastructure. They automate the backend operations, allowing enterprises to focus on what truly mattersâ€”extracting meaningful insights from their data.

Their platform is designed to offer operational and pricing transparency, making it easier for organizations to understand exactly what they are getting and what they are paying for. Moreover, HypaHub enhances collaboration in research and development, thereby accelerating scientific discovery.

**Tech Features and Benefits**  
- **Zero Onboarding**: Get started quickly without the usual setup delays.
- **Flexibility and Scalability**: Adapt resources as your project grows.
- **Automated Resource Management**: Save time and overhead with automated systems.
- **Enhanced Analytics**: Access powerful AI tools that streamline complex data processes.

To further boost productivity, HypaHubâ€™s eco-computing solutions promise up to 10x cost savings on operational expenses and up to 30% time savings on maintenance activities. Whether youâ€™re dealing with genomic analytics or need tools like HypaBfx, HypaML, or HypaCluster, HypaHub integrates these seamlessly into a cohesive workflow.

**Target Audience**  
Their services cater to a diverse range of usersâ€”academic institutions can access HypaHub for free if they qualify, while enterprises can engage with customized plans. This dual approach helps bridge the gap between academia and industry.

**Client Feedback and Uptake**  
Clients are raving about HypaHubâ€™s tools, with one citing it as "hands down the best tool in our R&D cloud." This kind of feedback not only highlights user satisfaction but also signals the platformâ€™s potential to drive meaningful progress in research.

**Current Team & Future Directions**  
With a compact team of just six dedicated employees, HypaHub is poised for growth. Their focus areas include continuous development in bioinformatics technologies, integration of cutting-edge AI tools, and enhancing community engagement to facilitate collaboration.

In summary, HypaHub is not just a cloud platform; it's a transformative force in bioinformatics, enabling scientists to unlock the potential of their data effortlessly. For anyone in the biotech sector looking to streamline their operations and drive innovation, a visit to [HypaHub's website](https://www.hypahub.com) for a demo is certainly warranted. 

*Get ready to maximize your productivity and insights with HypaHubâ€”where technology meets biology in an accessible, meaningful way.*
